==Linux==
  * mysqld

       # flightobserver - daemon reading data from Basestation's port #30003 and writing relevant info to database

       # flightprocessor - processsing (cleaning up, merging, geoclassify) flightdata, running as hourly cronjob

       # flightdatareducer - reduction of flight data, running as daily cronjob
